fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.registry.interfaces

Interface LookupCI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentInterface, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI, java.rmi.Remote, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI

    public interface LookupCI
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI
    The component interface LookupCI declares the methods offered by the registry to look up for sensor nodes existing in the sensor network.

    Description

    Black-box Invariant

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2023-12-12

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ConnectionInfoI findByIdentifier(java.lang.String sensorNodeId)
      return the connection information of the node with sensorNodeId or null if no such node exists.
      java.util.Set<ConnectionInfoI> findByZone(GeographicalZoneI z)
      return a set of all registered sensor nodes in z.

    • Method Detail

      • findByIdentifier

        ConnectionInfoI findByIdentifier(java.lang.String sensorNodeId)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        return the connection information of the node with sensorNodeId or null if no such node exists.

        Contract

         pre     sensorNodeId != null && !sensorNodeId.isEmpty()
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        sensorNodeId - identifier of the sought node.
        Returns:
        the connection information of the sought node or null if it does not exist.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.

      • findByZone

        java.util.Set<ConnectionInfoI> findByZone(GeographicalZoneI z)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        return a set of all registered sensor nodes in z.

        Contract

         pre     z != null
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        z - a geographical zone.
        Returns:
        a set of the connection information for all registered sensor nodes in z.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.
